term.title: Fermi energy

item.text: The total energy of an electron in an uncharged metal at the Fermi level.

sources.item: PAC, 1986, 58, 437. 'Interphases in systems of conducting phases (Recommendations 1985)' on page 440 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198658030437)
